item.description:
Come join us in our continuing exploration of Advanced Energy Healing!

This time we will view and discuss a talk by Ashayana Dean called "Getting Back Your Aliveness & The Power to Create Joy". This is not vague "fluff stuff"! Everything is described in terms of your multi-dimensional bio-spiritual anatomy, so bring your notebooks and personal recorders!

Although reference is made to a product called "Tangible Structure of the Soul", this inspiring and joyful presentation goes beyond that. Other topics include the mechanics of creation, and how to restore your original capability for perpetual health and wellness.

With Keylontic Science technologies, you can even heal the planet as you heal yourself!

Some interesting revelations about our ancient history are also included, as well as the reason why Indigoes are here.

Additional guests from a 6:00 PM hands-on Energy Healing Meetup may be joining in with us.

It's a good idea to check the website for a last minute cancellation notice before leaving. If less than three members have RSVP'd "yes", there will be no meeting.

Please do NOT park in the driveway with the "ULCS Clinic" sign. Instead go up the first driveway which has the Meetup Sign at the end. Enter through the front door with the Meetup sign, and go downstairs.
item.name: Getting Back Your Aliveness & The Power to Create Joy
